short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies page URL to clipboard and closes tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After activating by toolbar icon or page context menu, extension copies URL of current tab to clipboard and then closes tab. It also has some handy context menus in toolbar icon.
